issue.title: [Python] Provide for matching subclasses with register_type in serialization context
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1753](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1753). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Copied from https://github.com/apache/arrow/issues/1269

To allow factoring out serialization code to a common base class it would be useful if register_type matches all subclasses rather than simply an exact match on the specific type.
